About

Hello, there!

I am an engineer interested in Human-Computer Interaction, User Experience and Big Data.
I have received a master's degree in Human Factors Engineering from Ulsan National Institute of Science and Technology(UNIST). There, I joined Interactions Lab and studied the design space of interactions for technology-supported at-home exercises, advised by Professor Ian Oakley. Prior to this, I received a bachelor's degree in engineering with a specialization in Digital Image Processing and an interdisciplinary degree in Entrepreneurship from Chung-Ang University.

Updates

My current interests are in big data analysis and data science.
Recently, I joined a government-funded program on developing big data platforms at BIT Academy located in Seoul, Korea.
